Html:
I'm having problems with chirpy on vs2010.

at a certain point it just stopped to work and it does not minify my js any more.

any idea??

 

best

More detail available in output windows have section for chirpy error.

You are projet is : "web site projet" or "web site application" or "mvc" ?

Bug fix Wed at 7:55 PM

Watch work item  32

http://chirpy.codeplex.com/workitem/32

I do have the latest version on chirpy installed, but still not working.

Is there any way to see chirpy logs and see what is going wrong?

 

best

In output windows or error list.

New source code with more error handling (changeset= f8b3d178565e).

output windows is empty and there are no errors in the error list.
From the addin manager I can see that chirpy is enabled, as I Can see the Chirpy configuration on the options windows, but having a file called aaa.chirp.js, when I save it, the .min.js file is not generated...

is there a way to manually execute chirpy on a specific file?

Chirpy configuration is now root node not under Environment.

Fix bug in changeset: 53e0dfee342e

http://chirpy.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/changes/53e0dfee342e

Big thanks to Francis for handling this madness. Apologies for the issues--we expected to introduce some new bugs when we moved over to the modularized/engine-driven version of Chirpy, but we're slowing ironing out the details.

I've updated the 1.0.0.5 download to subversion 1.0.0.5.2. If you're still having issues, please consider downloading and installing the new version. If the problem persists, don't hesitate to let me know!

 

Cheers,

Evan

hi Evans, thanks for this, and thanks to ploufs for the fix.
I downloaded the code last night and the latest code base seems to work fine now. thanks
